text: This is a list of U.S. state fishes: ==Table== State Fish Binomial nomenclature Image Year Alabama Largemouth bass (fresh water) Micropterus salmoides 1975 Alabama Fighting tarpon (salt water) Megalops atlanticus 1955 Alaska King salmon Oncorhynchus tshawytscha 1962 Arizona Apache trout Oncorhynchus gilae (subspecies apache) 1986ASLAPR - Museum Division Arkansas Alligator gar (primitive) Atractosteus spatula 2019 California Golden trout (fresh water) Oncorhynchus mykiss (subspecies aguabonita) 1947 California Garibaldi (salt water) Hypsypops rubicundus 1995 Colorado Greenback cutthroat trout Oncorhynchus clarkii (subspecies stomias) 1994Colorado Department of Personnel & Administration (DPA) Division of Information Technologies (DoIT) Connecticut American shad Alosa sapidissima 2003 Delaware Weakfish Cynoscion regalis 1981 District of Columbia American Shad Alosa sapidissima Florida Florida largemouth bass (fresh water) Micropterus salmoides (subspecies floridanus) 2007Official state freshwater fish.
